translations: 贡献者；参与者；编著者（contributor 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: All the contributors were of African descent.
sentences.translation: 所有捐助者都是非洲血统。

sentences.sentence: All the contributors are credited on the title page.
sentences.translation: 所有撰稿人的姓名均刊登在扉页上。

sentences.sentence: Older people are important contributors to the economy.
sentences.translation: 老一辈人为发展经济作出了重要贡献。
